title: Pat Greer's Kitchen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, International, Organic, Raw, Catering, Take-out only
description: Offers takeaway raw vegan food that's gluten-free, including kookies, krackers, gRAWnolas, raw entrees, desserts, and even salad dressings and fermented veggies. On Saturday Pat operates a booth at Urban Harvest Farmers Market at Richmond and Eastside. The only non-vegan item is honey in a few products (ask).
